title: Rune Factory Frontier: Gino Gaiden
original_name: ルーンファクトリー フロンティア外伝　ジーノのフロンティアへの道
sinopse:
Gino yearns for a way to improve his village, and when exploring the frontier he heard rumours about Raguna's village, and how its people created and developed it from nothing.
Hoping it may give him his answer, he sets out on his own comedic, high energy adventure to become Raguna's disciple.

Synopsis: MAL
